metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12566 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-2, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMVGImage in coders/mvg.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service, related to the function ReadSVGImage in svg.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0137-memory-leak-in-ReadSVGImage.patch in unstable 0275-CVE-2017-12566-Fix-memory-leak-in-ReadMVGImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
